message.content:
cs.IT, cs.SP, cs.NA, cs.SI, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with signal reconstruction and approximation, which are topics related to information theory (cs.IT) and signal processing (cs.SP). The use of adaptive recovery algorithms and the need for new analytic tools suggest that the paper may also fall under numerical analysis (cs.NA) and machine learning (cs.LG). The last section on amplitude measurement implies that the paper may also be relevant to statistical inference (cs.SI).
